description: Momo-chan and her parents run a pet shop. Momo comes from Fenarinarsa which moved to near-Earth space when humans lost their dreams. Momo uses her magic to change into various 18 year old girls with expert skills in some area.

REGULAR.description:
Fairy Princess Minky Momo arrives in Somewhere City to do good deeds from the people of Earth! Her first task: save a horse ranch from the scheming Walder Itaducky!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ラブラブ・ミンキーモモ

REGULAR.description:
Mary Jane is a puppy who wants to be human. Momo gives her a taste of her wish, but things quickly spiral out of control...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メガネでチャームアップ

REGULAR.description:
Canny`s big brother Jimul has fallen in with a motorcycle gang. When he challenges the police to a race around town, Momo steps in to help avert disaster!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 走れスーパーライダー

REGULAR.description:
Ken is a standoffish boy with a kind heart. When Momo manages to befriend him, she learns of his strong belief in magic... and in Fenarinarsa, the magical kingdom that Momo comes from!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Boy Who Saw a Blue Bird

REGULAR.description:
Prince Tamtam of the Kingdom of Yusrarel is visiting Somewhere City, but what sounds like a dream for Momo becomes a nightmare when the prince is revealed as an incorrigible brat!
Source: crunchyroll

The orphans who live on the church on the hill await the return of their old friend Jimmy, now a famous tennis player. But Jimmy is telling a different story about his past...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Red Roses on the Tennis Court
テニスコートに赤いバラ

REGULAR.description:
Little Ann is awaiting surgery, but refuses to do anything the nurses tell her! More curiously, Ann once wanted to be a nurse herself... Can Momo reignite her love for the profession?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナイチンゲールはお好き

REGULAR.description:
Momo receives her first-ever love letter! She transforms into a policewoman to expidite things on her way to meet her secret admirer, but things quickly spin out of control!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujin Keikan tte Tsurai no Ne
婦人警官ってつらいのネ

REGULAR.description:
Forest singer Mack Kallent dreams of entering a song into the Dream Music Festival. Momo helps him achieve his goal... but the scheming singer Ganar has her sights on the song!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Song Festival of the Forest

REGULAR.description:
The crabby Madame Sarah comes along on Momo`s neighborhood trip, but her constant stream of complaints are cut short when she`s suddenly kidnapped! Can Momo rescue her?
Source: crunchyroll

Harry and Rosemary are star-crossed kitties, torn apart by a terrible misunderstanding. Momo hatches a plan to reunite the two, but it turns out not to be as easy as she hoped...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Groomer of Love and the Kitty-cat
恋の美容師よ子猫ちゃん

REGULAR.description:
The son of the great Phantom Thief Lupinne comes to Momo with a request: get his father to stop stealing! Momo transforms into a phantom thief to outshine him, and it kicks off a duel for the ages!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lupin the Master Thief`s Great Counterattack

REGULAR.description:
Young heir Ram wants to spend his days playing soccer, but his tutor is determined to get him to study! When he`s dragged away on the day of the big game, Momo springs into action to save him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Black Wizard and the Eleven Boys

REGULAR.description:
Walder Itaducky is back, and this time, he`s after a young man`s car repair shop! Can Momo win the big race to save the day again?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: High-speed Racer Going for the Goal
ゴールはいただき激走レーサー

REGULAR.description:
A quiet trip on a charming, old-fashioned railway is quickly thrown into chaos when the train`s brakes are sabotaged, sending it hurtling towards certain doom! Can Momo save the passengers?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le petit train dans la montagne
暴走列車が止まらない

REGULAR.description:
Momo travels to San Francisco to try playing Western, but is disappointed when the modern reality doesn`t match her vision. Until a man named Princeton comes to her with a request...
Source: crunchyroll

Momo`s on a drive with her friends Jack and Kate, when Kate is mysteriously abducted... by a vampire?! Momo will get to the bottom of this mystery!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Love Attack in the Haunted Mansion
おばけ屋敷でラブアタック

REGULAR.description:
During an island vacation, Momo meets a family of divers searching for a sunken treasure. Momo wants to help, but for some reason, her Fenarinarsa father isn`t happy about the idea...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Treasure of the Southern Island

REGULAR.description:
Momo and friends learn about an amusement park recreation of Fenarinarsa run entirely by computers. But shady figures are after the park`s secrets...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 機械じかけのフェナリナーサ

REGULAR.description:
Poachers are preying on the local wildlife in a small African village. Momo springs into action to save the animals... with a truly unexpected transformation!
Source: crunchyroll

A simple errand to deliver penguin sneeze extract turns into a grand adventure when Momo finds herself pitted against the international criminal organization, Surmech!
Source: crunchyroll

Momo`s secret agent adventure reaches its climax as they arrive in Paris and a dramatic back-and-forth over the penguin sneeze extract ensues!
Source: crunchyroll

The king of Fenarinarsa decides to visit Momo on Earth, but his carefree and stubborn ways quickly cause chaos on the streets of Somewhere City!
Source: crunchyroll

After Momo rescues a unicorn on the run in Somewhere City, she encounters a unicorn collector named Mr. Berlich... but what are his true motives?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il n`y a plus de saison (2)
さすらいのユニコーン

REGULAR.description:
Spunky young Saki has founded an all-girls` baseball team to play against the boys. When their first opponent turns out to be the national champions, will they be able to prove themselves?
Source: crunchyroll

Momo`s adoptive father is late returning from a job up north. When Momo goes to investigate, she finds an entire town acting strangely.
Source: crunchyroll

Momo seeks to find out why ships are disappearing in the Pomuda Triangle... and finds high-seas adventure, pirates, and more!
Source: crunchyroll

A simple errand to deliver a rare egg to a zoo one town over turns complicated when it turns out the stretch of road they`re traveling is being used for a street race.
Source: crunchyroll

Little Tony`s friends are calling him a liar for insisting he saw a UFO. Momo tries to help, but every attempt seems to make things worse for Tony...
Source: crunchyroll

Momo and friends decide to check out a rocket launch... but end up on the rocket themselves. With Momo playing astronaut, will the ship reach its destination?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ふるさと行きの宇宙船

REGULAR.description:
Why does a random tropical island have statues of Momo and her friends? When Momo goes to investigate, the answer she finds is more strange than she could have expected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La légende des statues de pierre

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious sea monster washes ashore in Overthere City, causing a flurry among the scientific community. It`ll take Momo to get to the heart of the matter...
Source: crunchyroll

Ryan and Nana are lovers on the run, with a shadowy organization in pursuit. Can Momo help them to escape? And what is the secret Ryan and Nana are hiding?
Source: crunchyroll

When Momo`s adoptive father goes missing, her search for him takes her to the center of the Earth, where the fiery Princess Rae acts as guardian of a prehistoric world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Princess of the Center of the Earth
地底の底のプリンセス

REGULAR.description:
While in her adult form, Momo finds herself swept off her feet by a charming man named Albert. But Albert seems to be caught up in much darker affairs...
Source: crunchyroll

Momo befriends a ghost in a large house in town. The house is scheduled to be torn down, but the ghost has one final request before he passes on...
Source: crunchyroll

Is Momo`s adoptive father... cheating on his wife?! It certainly seems that way when he`s seen meeting with young trapeze artist Judy. It`s up to Momo to get to the bottom of things!
Source: crunchyroll

A day of fun in the snow leads Momo and friends to meet Sara, a snow fairy with lingering regrets about her former time as a human.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Chance Meeting in the Snow

REGULAR.description:
Momo`s adoptive father is kidnapped! Momo rushes to save him... and so does her adoptive mother! When she collides with Momo in mid-transformation, an unexpected thing happens...
Source: crunchyroll

When Momo`s adoptive mother won`t seem to wake up, Momo and her friends enter her dreams to find out what`s wrong.
Source: crunchyroll

When young Paul reveals he`s never gotten a present from Santa Claus, Momo sets out to find out what exactly has gone wrong at the North Pole.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: お願いサンタクロース

REGULAR.description:
A series of misunderstandings surrounding a general`s sick cat pushes two superpowers to the brink of all-out war! Can Momo save the day... and the world?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 間違いだらけの大作戦

REGULAR.description:
A meet cute with a handsome young animator leads Momo to wonder... is it possible for someone from Fenarinarsa to find true love with someone from Earth?
Source: crunchyroll

A curious collision leads to an angel losing his wings in the vicinity of Momo`s house. How will Momo deal with the increasingly frustrated angel?
Source: crunchyroll

A malfunction in the Gourmet Poppo leads Momo to try to run an errand on foot. When she`s separated from her animal companions, she has to find a non-magical way to reunite with them...
Source: crunchyroll

Having lost her powers, Momo has made a committment to live as an ordinary girl on Earth. Until one day, suddenly...
Source: crunchyroll

The King of Fenarinarsa looks back on Momo`s story as the cast prepares for a new adventure.
Source: crunchyroll

The King of Fenarinarsa looks back on the people Momo`s met as the cast prepares for a new adventure.
Source: crunchyroll

The arrogant Peachboy declares he`s going to take out a nearby nest of oni. Momo is forced to tag along to make sure he doesn`t get himself (or her companions) hurt.
Source: crunchyroll

A foray into Fairy Tale Forest leads Momo to get involved in the story of Snow White and the sinister Devil Queen.
Source: crunchyroll

Momo befriends a famous stunt man and actor making his return to the silver screen after three years in retirement. But her new friend is hiding a secret...
Source: crunchyroll

To help a heartbroken penguin mother at the zoo, Momo and friends plan to disguise Mocha as a baby penguin... a plan Mocha isn`t too happy about!
Source: crunchyroll

A visit to distant Dunno Village leads Momo to a curious sight: a steam train running through a bed of flowers. The nearby Miss Cecilia seems to know something about it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Steam Engine Running Through the Flower Field

REGULAR.description:
Momo travels to Heaven Island to help with an outbreak of sickness among the animals... but to help the animals of nearby Little Island, she`ll have to fly there!
Source: crunchyroll

The Devil Queen makes her return to Somewhere City hoping to make amends, but her reputation precedes her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 愛[ラブ]・アップルでもう一度

REGULAR.description:
Momo travels to Peaceful Village and meets Sibelle, a girl treated as an outcast for her curious powers. What has turned the hearts of the villagers against her?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Girl in the Dappled Shade

REGULAR.description:
Substituting in for her superintendent aunt, Momo meets the colorful characters of an apartment... one of whom is an inventor looking to make it big!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 人力飛行機ラプソディー

REGULAR.description:
An enthusiastic Momo agrees to hand out flyers for a piano concert coming up, but people begin to say the concert is fake, and accuse Momo of being a fraud!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペテン師のノクターン

REGULAR.description:
Overthere Park in Somewhere City has seen better days. Momo wants to work with the young girl, Faerie, to restore the park`s flowers... and its fairies!
Source: crunchyroll

A mysterious event takes Momo back in time to when her parents were first dating... but will the past rewrite itself?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Time is the Cradle of Love

REGULAR.description:
The dark presence that has been pursuing Momo sets its sights on a new target... the reformed Devil Queen`s apple orchard!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 愛[ラブ]・アップルよ永遠に

REGULAR.description:
The nightmare finally makes its move against Momo, infecting the animals of the pet shop and sending her on the run.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shadow Stealing into the Night

REGULAR.description:
Momo and friends make their last stand against the nightmare!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよならは言わないで

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 魔法のプリンセス_ミンキーモモ

titles.title: 魔法のプリンセス ミンキーモモ
